Description: I cannot get any Database object at Database Explorer and got an error at consolelog when expanding a schema.
 
 OS: SLES9 sp3 ja_JP.UTF8
 Build: wtp-wst-sdk-I-I200603100726
 DB: Derby 10.1.2.1/IBM DB2 ESE V8.1 FP11
 Steps to recreate problem:
        1- Launch Database Explorer view
        2- Create a connection
        3- Expand the connected database and schema
      And then I got the following error message at consolelog and could not get any DB objects.

      Additional Info: This problem did not occur in RHEL4 U2 WS (ja_JP.UTF8).
